lead_paragraph: STEINER--Paul. On behalf of our colleagues at DLA Piper and alumni of Brown Raysman Millstein Felder & Steiner LLP, we mourn the passing of Paul Steiner, beloved father of our friend and partner Jeffrey Steiner. We extend warm condolences to Jeff, his mother Ellen, his wife Elissa and their sons David and Andrew, as well as to Jeffrey's brothers and other family. May Paul's memory continue to nourish them. You all gave him much naches. Scott, Bob, Rand, Jason, Bob and Ken. 1/3
